, (SELECT ST_DISTANCE_SPHERE(POINT(127.1324143491829, 35.84026098258203), POINT(m.mbMapX, m.mbMapY))) AS distance
, (SELECT #{mbMapY}) AS selectMapY , (SELECT #{mbMapX}) AS selectMapX , (SELECT ST_DISTANCE_SPHERE(POINT(#{mbMapX}, #{mbMapY}), POINT(m.mbMapX, m.mbMapY))) AS distance
, (SELECT ST_DISTANCE_SPHERE(POINT(#{mbMapX}, #{mbMapY}), POINT(m.mbMapX, m.mbMapY))) AS distance
, (SELECT #{mbMapY}) AS selectMapY , (SELECT #{mbMapX}) AS selectMapX , (SELECT ST_DISTANCE_SPHERE(POINT(#{mbMapX}, #{mbMapY}), POINT(m.mbMapX, m.mbMapY))) AS distance
FROM member m JOIN trainerinfo t ON m.mbNo = t.mbNo AND t.tnDelYN = 'N' JOIN centerinfo c ON t.ctNo = c.ctNo AND c.ctDelYN = 'N'
WHERE m.mbDelYN = 'N'
AND (SELECT ST_DISTANCE_SPHERE(POINT(127.1324143491829, 35.84026098258203), POINT(m.mbMapX, m.mbMapY))) <= #{distance}
AND (SELECT ST_DISTANCE_SPHERE(POINT(#{mbMapX}, #{mbMapY}), POINT(m.mbMapX, m.mbMapY))) <= #{distance}
AND (SELECT ST_DISTANCE_SPHERE(POINT(#{mbMapX}, #{mbMapY}), POINT(m.mbMapX, m.mbMapY))) <= #{distance} AND NOT m.mbNo = #{mbNo}
AND (SELECT ST_DISTANCE_SPHERE(POINT(#{mbMapX}, #{mbMapY}), POINT(m.mbMapX, m.mbMapY))) <= #{distance}
ORDER BY distance ASC
